title: contacts: business directory
content:
Our business email is at Google.

Google contacts also has a "directory" entry that stores all contacts.

If someone calls me, I want it to show me the name of this directory.

It worked with Android 9, but I think that's not working since Android 10.

In the contacts I can search, it just does not show me the names of the callers.

Is there a special setting here?
